timeline.bodyText: Can also be changed to https.
timeline.author: mcalmer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1199,95 +1199,95 @@ repo_url = https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/systemsmanagement:/Uyuni:/
 archs    = %(_x86_archs)s
 name     = Oracle Linux 6 (%(arch)s)
 checksum = sha256
-gpgkey_url = http://yum.oracle.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-oracle-ol6
+gpgkey_url = https://yum.oracle.com/RPM-GPG-KEY-oracle-ol6
 gpgkey_id = EC551F03
 gpgkey_fingerprint = 4214 4123 FECF C55B 9086  313D 72F9 7B74 EC55 1F03
-repo_url = http://yum.oracle.com/repo/OracleLinux/OL6/latest/%(arch)s/
+repo_url = https://yum.oracle.com/repo/OracleLinux/OL6/latest/%(arch)s/
 dist_map_release = 6

-repo_url = http://yum.oracle.com/repo/OracleLinux/OL6/addons/%(arch)s/
+repo_url = https://yum.oracle.com/repo/OracleLinux/OL6/addons/%(arch)s/

 [oraclelinux6-scl]

replies.bodyText:
What do you mean :-?
I see the diff and it's now https.
replies.author: juliogonzalez

replies.bodyText: Ah, saw it now. You mean oraclelinux6-scl itself. Sorry.
replies.author: juliogonzalez

replies.bodyText: Yes, I could not add the comment at that place
replies.author: mcalmer
